duties_responsibilities.duty: Process product deliveries with full attention to detail and compliance with receiving procedures.
Maintain backstock area, cooler, and receiving supplies.
Ensure refrigerated items are stocked or stored properly.
Organize designated loads and manage merchandise return/transfer area.
Follow health and sanitation procedures and safe work practices.
Operate equipment safely and report any violations of company policy, accidents, or injuries.
Effectively communicate with team members regarding receiving and department operations.
Develop working knowledge of all department vendors and verify each delivery.
Assist in stocking product and file completed paperwork.
Maintain employee safety and security standards.
